definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: I think we should let Sylvia go camping with her boy-friend.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我們應該讓Sylvia和她男友一起去宿營。

sentences.english: Two downtown Portland parks where Occupy Portland demonstrators camped for weeks are clear Monday and police say crews will be removing debris and assessing damage.
sentences.chinese: 波特蘭兩個示威者宿營的城市公園在週一得到了清理。

sentences.english: English: How do I book a camping site?
sentences.chinese: 請問我應該怎樣預定一個宿營車位？

sentences.english: They were encamped in the tents.
Your bivouac for the night is the spot where you got tired of marching that day.
sentences.chinese: 你夜間的宿營地是你白天行軍累了的處所。
在人生征途的露宿營地。

sentences.english: So I'm always looking for a place to keep my camp.
sentences.chinese: 所以我總是要尋找可以宿營的地方。

sentences.english: In my best Slovak, I asked, “Where is a campground?”
sentences.chinese: 我用最拿手的斯洛伐克語問，“宿營地在哪兒？”

sentences.english: It was too dark to go on, so we camped there.
sentences.chinese: 天太黑不能再走了，我們只好就地宿營。

sentences.english: The soldiers were bivouacked in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們被安排在樹林裏宿營。

sentences.english: But now the campers all had outboards.
sentences.chinese: 可現在宿營者用的全是尾掛馬達。

sentences.english: I wanted to camp out here. I soon realized I was out of balance.
sentences.chinese: 我想宿營在這裏的野外，突然我意識到我失去了平衡。

sentences.english: They camped on the shore of Lake Bala.
We like to camp on the flats near the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們想要在湖邊的平地上宿營。

sentences.english: Their reasons for taking part in the protest and the long-term camping in urban areas vary.
sentences.chinese: 他們參加抗議以及在市區長期宿營的理由各不相同。

sentences.english: The billet is held in place in the die by a hold-down ring.
sentences.chinese: 宿營由壓制圓環拿着到位在模子。

definition: Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4

definition: Santimen township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
Checheng township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
